text: Hendrick Rudolf "Henk" Chin A Sen (; 18 January 1934 â€“ 11 August 1999) was a Surinamese politician who was the President of Suriname from 15 August 1980 until 4 February 1982. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Presidents of Suriname Category:Prime Ministers of Suriname
title: Henk Chin A Sen
